title: Provides Yonkers city school district with additional supplemental education improvement plan funds
summary: Provides Yonkers city school district with additional supplemental education improvement plan funds.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         2248

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 14, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by  M.  of  A.  SPANO,  PRETLOW,  ABINANTI  -- read once and
         referred to the Committee on Education

       AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to providing the  Yonkers
         city  school  district with additional supplemental education improve-
         ment plan funds

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section  1. Paragraph b of subdivision 8 of section 3641 of the educa-
    2  tion law, as amended by section 29 of part B of chapter 57 of  the  laws
    3  of 2008, is amended to read as follows:
    4    b.  To  the Yonkers city school district there shall be paid seventeen
    5  million five hundred thousand dollars ($17,500,000) on an  annual  basis
    6  PLUS  AN  AMOUNT  EQUIVALENT TO THE PERCENTAGE INCREASE, CARRIED TO FOUR
    7  DECIMALS, IN THE YONKERS CITY SCHOOL DISTRICT PUBLIC ENROLLMENT PURSUANT
    8  TO FOUNDATION AID UNDER SUBDIVISION FOUR OF SECTION  THIRTY-SIX  HUNDRED
    9  TWO  OF THIS ARTICLE FROM THE TWO THOUSAND NINE--TWO THOUSAND TEN SCHOOL
   10  YEAR TO THE TWO THOUSAND TEN--TWO THOUSAND ELEVEN SCHOOL YEAR MULTIPLIED
   11  BY THE DISTRICT'S FOUNDATION AID AMOUNT.  SUCH  INCREASE  SHALL  NOT  BE
   12  SUBJECT  TO  SECTION  TWO  HUNDRED ELEVEN-D OF THIS CHAPTER.  Such grant
   13  shall be payable from funds appropriated for such purpose and  shall  be
   14  apportioned  to  the Yonkers city school district in accordance with the
   15  payment schedules contained in section thirty-six hundred nine-a of this
   16  article, notwithstanding any provision of law to the contrary.
   17    S 2. This act shall take effect July 1, 2011.



        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD04602-01-1
